fields.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All (C1)
fields.value: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

fields.name: Bunny Triggered (C2)
fields.value:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

fields.name: It Burns! (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: It's Not Just Any Doll... (C4)
fields.value: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

fields.name: It's Baron Bunny! (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Wildfire (C6)
fields.value: Fiery Rain increases all party member's Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.
